title: [Basalt Plateau, Third Tier]
description: The trail halts at a pile of rocks, which slides away over the lip of the ravine as though frozen in time.  Overhead, wasp nests cling to the bluff, huge, ominous constructions full of vehemence.  A half-desiccated carcass lies cradled within the stones, its rib bones adding a sculptural quality to the jumble.

The trail halts at a pile of rocks, which slides away over the lip of the ravine as though frozen in time.  Overhead, wasp nests cling to the bluff, huge, ominous constructions full of vehemence.  A half-desiccated carcass lies cradled within the stones, its bleached rib bones adding a sculptural quality to the jumble.
